This course is intended to introduce the growing wearables product category, overview current devices, and help you sell wearables as part of the AT&T Experience.

 

After completing this course, you'll be able to:

•Describe key features of wearables.

•Qualify target customers.

•Offer wearables matched to customers' needs.
